title: Route 66
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,178 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 890L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Q and W
description: Originally built as America's first major highway, Route 66 has taken on a life of its own and has become a wildly eclectic travel destination. Route 66 details the history and evolution of this historic highway including the artistic oddities found along the way. The book can also be used to teach students how to effectively sequence events and summarize. The book and lesson are also available for levels Q and W.
highFrequencyWords: bypassed, convertible, deteriorate, fiberglass, highway, landmarks, preserving, road trip, transported
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
